description:
The chances for your success dramatically increase when you surround yourself with high achievers. They will push you to achieve your goals and dreams. This is the purpose of a mastermind.

A mastermind is like your own personal board of directors, a group that meets regularly, who are dedicated to your success. No successful person can achieve great things alone. A mastermind is a business tool that great businessmen such as Benjamin Franklin, Theodore Roosevelt, Peter Drucker, and Henry Ford used to bring them great success.

But maybe you're like me. You live in small town USA, and don't know where to find high achievers. That's where a virtual mastermind comes into your success story.

What You'll Learn

This course is a simple guide to teach you how you can start a virtual mastermind in less than 30 days and potentially create side income. Yes, people are willing to pay to be a part of such a group!

You will learn how to run a mastermind meeting, how to find members, how to host the meeting online, how much you should charge for your meeting, and a few tips & tricks I learned along the way.

I will also host a few interviews with entrepreneurs who host masterminds and make a few thousand dollars each month.

What You'll Create

At the end of this course you will create a mastermind that will push you to achieve more in your business. Not only that, but you could create another stream of income.
title: Hangout and Grow Rich
